meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt Lieff Sharon Keld Tom Lawrence Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #848.

td.p: Matt Lieff, a training manager from Cheltenham, Pennsylvania
Sharon Keld, a product manager from Chicago, Illinois
Tom Lawrence, a performing waiter from Davenport, Iowa (whose 2-day cash winnings total $18,800)

tr.td: BOOKS & AUTHORS
NURSERY RHYMES
HITS OF THE '80s
I'LL TAKE MANHATTAN
WOMEN
WEAPONS

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
